properties.name: Sunny Villa
properties.description: Spacious villa with a pool and garden, ideal for families.
properties.longDescription: This luxurious villa boasts five bedrooms, four bathrooms, one large modern kitchen, and multiple living areas. It features a beautifully landscaped garden, a private pool, and a grand outdoor seating area, making it perfect for family gatherings. The interiors are elegantly designed with premium materials, and the property offers breathtaking coastal views.
properties.fullDescription: Sunny Villa is a premium residence offering unparalleled comfort and elegance. The property includes five spacious bedrooms with walk-in closets, four bathrooms equipped with high-end fittings, a gourmet kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, and two living areas designed for relaxation and entertainment. The villa also has a dedicated study, a children's playroom, and a separate laundry room. Outdoor features include a well-maintained garden, a barbecue area, and a private driveway with space for up to three vehicles.

properties.name: Urban Flat
properties.description: Modern flat in the city center with all amenities.
properties.longDescription: Located in the heart of the city, this apartment boasts modern interiors, two spacious bedrooms, and convenient access to public transport, shopping, and dining options.
properties.fullDescription: Urban Flat is a stylish two-bedroom apartment offering a modern living experience in the city's heart. The flat features an open-plan living room and kitchen, a contemporary bathroom, and a balcony overlooking the vibrant streets. Amenities include secure entry, lift access, and proximity to major transport hubs.
properties.location: 101 Monks Orchard Rd, Beckenham BR3 3BJ, UK

properties.name: Shrub Cottage
properties.description: Beautiful cottage surrounded by nature and tranquility.
properties.longDescription: This charming three-bedroom cottage offers a serene escape with its rustic charm, fireplace, and proximity to picturesque walking trails and nature reserves.
properties.fullDescription: Cosy Cottage is a delightful retreat featuring three well-sized bedrooms, two bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and a warm, inviting living room with a traditional fireplace. The property is surrounded by a lush garden, with a patio perfect for outdoor dining. Located in Sussex's peaceful countryside, it is ideal for nature lovers seeking a tranquil home.
properties.location: Shrub Cottage, Church Path, London SW19 3HJ, UK

properties.name: Luxury Penthouse
properties.description: Elegant penthouse with panoramic city views.
properties.longDescription: Perched atop a skyline tower, this penthouse features luxurious finishes, expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, private terraces, and premium amenities.
properties.fullDescription: Luxury Penthouse offers a lavish living experience with four spacious bedrooms, three modern bathrooms, a gourmet kitchen, and an open-plan living area. The penthouse is adorned with high-end finishes, offering unparalleled panoramic city views from multiple terraces. Additional features include a private elevator, concierge service, and exclusive access to rooftop amenities.

properties.name: Grand Manor
properties.description: Elegant manor with spacious grounds and luxury features.
properties.longDescription: This grand manor includes six luxurious bedrooms, five bathrooms, two kitchens, and stunning landscaped gardens. Located in the prestigious Richmond area, it offers privacy and elegance.
properties.fullDescription: Grand Manor is an exquisite estate perfect for upscale living. It features six spacious bedrooms with en-suites, a grand ballroom, a state-of-the-art kitchen, and extensive gardens with a pond. The property offers ample parking and a private driveway.
properties.location: Berkswell Hall, Meriden Rd, Coventry CV7 7BG, UK

properties.name: Seaside Bungalow
properties.description: Relaxing bungalow with sea views and modern amenities.
properties.longDescription: This seaside bungalow offers a perfect getaway with its cozy interiors, three bedrooms, and a modern kitchen. Enjoy stunning views and a peaceful location.
properties.fullDescription: Seaside Bungalow is a charming property ideal for families or couples looking for a relaxing retreat. It includes three comfortable bedrooms, a modern kitchen, and a spacious living room. Outdoor features include a patio and direct beach access.

properties.name: Suburban Dream Home
properties.description: A spacious family house in a quiet suburban neighborhood.
properties.longDescription: This four-bedroom house features modern interiors, a spacious living room, and a fully equipped kitchen. The property boasts a private garden, a garage for two cars, and a cozy patio area.
properties.fullDescription: Suburban Dream Home offers a perfect balance of comfort and functionality. It includes four bedrooms with ample closet space, three bathrooms with stylish fittings, and an open-plan kitchen and dining area. Outdoors, enjoy a lush garden, a private driveway, and a barbecue-ready patio, perfect for family activities.
properties.location: Danesfield, Whalley Range, Manchester M16 8BT, UK

properties.name: Seaside Apartment
properties.description: A cozy seaside apartment with stunning ocean views.
properties.longDescription: Located near the beach, this two-bedroom apartment features modern interiors, a spacious balcony, and all essential amenities. Perfect for small families or individuals seeking a tranquil retreat.
properties.fullDescription: Seaside Apartment offers breathtaking views of the ocean and provides all the comforts of a modern lifestyle. It includes two spacious bedrooms, two bathrooms, a stylish kitchen, and a large balcony perfect for relaxing evenings. The property is conveniently located near shops, restaurants, and public transport.
